document.full_text: canadian regulators see no big environmental impact from a plan to expand a nuclear power station 70 km (45 miles) from canada's biggest city, toronto, but greenpeace activists halted a second day of hearings with pleas for a delay while japan unravels its nuclear mess.
document.title: canada nuclear plan gets environmental ok
lines_and_colors: canadian regulators see no big environmental impact from a plan to expand a nuclear power station 70 km (45 miles) from canada's biggest city, toronto, but greenpeace activists halted a second day of hearings with pleas for a delay while japan unravels its nuclear mess.
